description: Resource Type definition for AWS::Transfer::Certificate. Source:- No source definition found, add manually please

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Usage.description: Specifies the usage type for the certificate.

Certificate.description: Specifies the certificate body to be imported.

CertificateChain.description: Specifies the certificate chain to be imported.

PrivateKey.description: Specifies the private key for the certificate.

ActiveDate.description: Specifies the active date for the certificate.

InactiveDate.description: Specifies the inactive date for the certificate.

Description.description: A textual description for the certificate.

Tags.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for certificates. Tags are metadata attached to certificates for any purpose.

title: AWS::Transfer::Certificate
